definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
substitute actor (esp. in fights of theatrical stunts)/stuntman
cast (of a movie etc)/lineup of performers/troupe

sentences.english: Direct your actors to stay in character. Ask them to study their characters.
sentences.chinese: 指导你的演员入戏，要他们研究角色。

sentences.english: He is just a small-time actor.
sentences.chinese: 他不过是个跑龙套的演员。

sentences.english: Hong Kong TVB actress Yung Mei Ling was discovered dead at her home yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 香港无线电视演员容美玲被发现死在家里昨天。

sentences.english: It's my Daddy, the actor, about to die with his boots on.
sentences.chinese: 那是我爸爸，那个演员，即将横死的画面。

sentences.english: Kim So-yeon is an actress who exudes both innocence and confidence.
sentences.chinese: 金素妍是一个即天真又自信的女演员。

sentences.english: It was just his vulgar way of showing off.
sentences.chinese: 那样子就像歌唱演员表演似的，完全是庸俗的炫耀。

sentences.english: Do the voice actors ever visit the studio to see the animation process?
sentences.chinese: 演员声优是否在工作室看到过动画制作的进程？

sentences.english: An actor circling the stage suggests a long journey.
sentences.chinese: 而演员绕台奔走则代表长途跋涉。

sentences.english: The Gibeonites were very good actors!
sentences.chinese: 这些基遍人真是很好的演员。

sentences.english: The budget will depend on the script, what kind of financing the producer can get, and also who is cast in the movie.
sentences.chinese: 预算取决于剧本，获得的投资以及影片的演员阵容。

sentences.english: The domain level focuses strictly on business interactions viewed from the perspective of the external actor.
sentences.chinese: 域层次严格集中在从外部演员的角度看到的业务交互。

sentences.english: Eextremeccly member of the original cast am signed except her.
sentences.chinese: 除她之外的原班演员都是签约的。

sentences.english: What is life like for a dubber in Beijing?
sentences.chinese: 北京的配音演员过着怎样的生活？

sentences.english: Multi-actor dialog timeline for actor conversations.
sentences.chinese: 多演员的演员交谈对话的时间表。

sentences.english: Multi-actor dialog timeline for actor conversations.
sentences.chinese: 多演员的演员交谈对话的时间表。

sentences.english: What sort of acting do you do?
sentences.chinese: 所以，你是具体做什么演员？

definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
to put on a play/to perform/fig. to pretend/to feign
(neologism c. 2014) celebrity with a huge, devoted fan base/celebrity with a huge following on social media
to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)
to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
